## getStacks() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get an array of all stacks on a board, optionally sorting for rendering.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getStacks(board: GameBoard, sortForRender?: boolean): HexStack[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

sortForRender


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Flag indicating tiles should be sorted for rendering.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[HexStack](./hive-lib.hexstack.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of stacks.

## Remarks

When sorted for rendering, stacks in the returned array are ordered from back to front, shortest to tallest.
